name: Demolition Pong
description:
Alpha preview release

Alpha release contains 1 demo campaign with 14 levels showing current game features.

More campaigns and level editor will be included in a final Win/Android/IOS builds.

Play hints

  • You can temporarily slow down time in game by pressing fire button (or left mouse)
  • You can change viewing angle with mouse wheel or right analog joystick. If you go bellow 45deg it will go into 3rd person mode control style
  • Please use Options menu to adjust control sensitivity and smoothness if it does not feel right
